import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FaShieldAlt, FaRocket, FaCogs, FaBars, FaTimes } from 'react-icons/fa'; const HomePage = () => { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); return (
{/* Header */}
Vortrex
{['Home', 'Features', 'Presale', 'Roadmap', 'Contact'].map((item, i) => ( {item} ))}
{menuOpen && (
{['Home', 'Features', 'Presale', 'Roadmap', 'Contact'].map((item, i) => ( {item} ))}
)}
{/* Hero Section */}

Revolutionizing the Future of Crypto

{/* Background Image Section */}

Empowering the Next Generation of DeFi

Vortrex is designed to lead innovation in secure, fast, and decentralized finance.

{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Vortrex?

{[ { Icon: FaShieldAlt, title: 'Security First', desc: 'Complete security with the highest encryption standards.' }, { Icon: FaRocket, title: 'Fast Transactions', desc: 'Instant transfers with minimal fees and no delays.' }, { Icon: FaCogs, title: 'Decentralized', desc: 'A truly decentralized platform with no middlemen.' } ].map(({ Icon, title, desc }, i) => (

{title}

{desc}

))}
{/* Presale Section */}

Get early access to Vortrex tokens. Limited time offer!

Our Roadmap

{item.quarter}

{item.desc}

))}

{['Facebook', 'Twitter', 'Telegram'].map((platform, i) => ( {platform} ))}
); }; export default HomePage;
